item.title: SixThirty
item.dc:creator: Olivia Oppelt
item.description:
SixThirty is a FinTech venture fund and accelerator. Partnership between the St. Louis Financial Forum (Regional Chamber) and Cultivation Capital. Our focus is business development, targeting late-seed stage FinTech startups that have a product, market traction, and are starting to earn revenue.

The post SixThirty appeared first on Just Cash.
item.content:encoded:
• SixThirty is a FinTech venture fund and accelerator.
  • Partnership between the St. Louis Financial Forum (Regional Chamber) and Cultivation Capital.
  • Our focus is business development, targeting late-seed stage FinTech startups that have a product, market traction, and are starting to earn revenue.

The post SixThirty appeared first on Just Cash.

item.title: Jay Delong
item.dc:creator: Olivia Oppelt
item.description:
Jay is Founding Partner of Active Capital and directs the Regional Chamber’s New Ventures & Capital Formation in St. Louis, MO.

The post Jay Delong appeared first on Just Cash.
item.content:encoded:
Jay is Founding Partner of Active Capital and directs the Regional Chamber’s New Ventures & Capital Formation in St. Louis, MO.

The post Jay Delong appeared first on Just Cash.

item.title: Jim Whalen
item.dc:creator: Olivia Oppelt
item.description:
Jim is the Senior Vice President of MasterCard’s Digital Product Introduction Group. Regarded as an effective leader who achieves outcomes through comprehensive analysis, overall strategic thinking, and team development.

The post Jim Whalen appeared first on Just Cash.
item.content:encoded:
Jim is the Senior Vice President of MasterCard’s Digital Product Introduction Group. Regarded as an effective leader who achieves outcomes through comprehensive analysis, overall strategic thinking, and team development.

The post Jim Whalen appeared first on Just Cash.

item.title: Paris Aden
item.dc:creator: Olivia Oppelt
item.description:
Paris is involved as both an advisor and a private equity principal in greater than 100 M&A transactions worth in excess of $80B. Former RBC, CSFB, Clairvest, and Morgan Stanley. Co-Founder of Valitas Capital and Alluence Capital Advisors.

The post Paris Aden appeared first on Just Cash.
item.content:encoded:
Paris is involved as both an advisor and a private equity principal in greater than 100 M&A transactions worth in excess of $80B. Former RBC, CSFB, Clairvest, and Morgan Stanley. Co-Founder of Valitas Capital and Alluence Capital Advisors.

The post Paris Aden appeared first on Just Cash.
